resources.string: The title must not be empty
The price must be greater than or equal to 0
The capacity must be greater than 0
The waitlist capacity must be empty or greater than 0
The open date cannot be in the past
The closed date must be after the open date
The start date must be after the closed date
The end date must be after the start date
The date must be after the closed date
The name must not be empty
The phone number must not be either empty or at least 7 digits
The email must be a valid email address
The name must not be empty
